org.jboss.windup.exec.configuration.WindupConfiguration

    org.jboss.windup.exec

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void WindupProcessorImpl.execute(WindupConfiguration config) 
      void WindupProcessor.execute(WindupConfiguration config)

    • Uses of WindupConfiguration in org.jboss.windup.exec.configuration

      Methods in org.jboss.windup.exec.configuration that return WindupConfiguration 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WindupConfiguration WindupConfiguration.addDefaultUserIgnorePath(Path path)
      Adds a path to the list of default Paths with directories/files that contain files with regexes of file names to be ignored.
      WindupConfiguration WindupConfiguration.addDefaultUserRulesDirectory(Path path)
      Contains a list of Paths with the directory that contains user provided rules.
      WindupConfiguration WindupConfiguration.setGraphContext(GraphContext context)
      Sets the GraphContext instance on which the WindupProcessor should execute.
      WindupConfiguration WindupConfiguration.setInputPath(Path inputPath)
      Contains the path to the input file (or directory) to be processed
      WindupConfiguration WindupConfiguration.setOffline(boolean offline)
      Set Windup to run online or offline (with respect to an internet connection).
      WindupConfiguration WindupConfiguration.setOptionValue(String name, Object value)
      Sets a configuration option to the specified value.
      WindupConfiguration WindupConfiguration.setOutputDirectory(Path outputDirectory)
      Contains the directory to put the output to (migration report, temporary files, exported graph data...).
      WindupConfiguration WindupConfiguration.setProgressMonitor(WindupProgressMonitor progressMonitor)
      A progress monitor which will get notification of the rule execution progress.
      WindupConfiguration WindupConfiguration.setRuleProviderFilter(org.jboss.forge.furnace.util.Predicate<RuleProvider> ruleProviderFilter)
      A filter to limit which rule providers' rules will be executed.
